channel.title: This is a title! on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in This is a title! on My New Hugo Site

item.title: BscScanner
item.description: A wrapper library for the BscScan WebAPI, with dependency injection support.

item.title: Fusion Karts
item.description: A multiplayer kart game made in Unity, using Photon Fusion networking package. My job was to write the netcode.

item.title: GetChain
item.description: A website that aggregates multiple blockchain APIs into a single API endpoint. Built using ASP.NET Core’s Razor Pages, with a built in REST WebAPI.

item.title: Illusive
item.description: A forum website made on the ASP.NET Core framework using Razor pages (an alternative to ASP.NET Core’s MVC design pattern), which allows for a simpler bridge between back-end and front-end data.
